NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
April 20, 1954
Dr, H* N, Lowe
Asst, to the President
Eastern Montana College
Billings, Montana
Dear Dr* Lowes
I am very happy to inform you officially that the Board of Erectors of
NAEB has approved your application for associate membership in our organ-
isation.
You will now be receiving r egularly from us the monthly IASB newsletter,
additional publications of interest, and many other things.
You should, of course, feel free to write to this office at any time for
any information concerning educational broadcasting,
Under separate cover we are sending you a copy of the HAEB Radio-T?.Bib¬
liography which we hope you will find helpful.
Perhaps the greatest good of an KAJBB membership is the association you
form. It *s good to know that others are having the same problems you
are and how they are solving the®. It has been the tradition within FAE3
to exchange this sort of information on a friend-to-friend basis. You #11
find lots of friends in HAEB,
Sincerely,
Harry J* Skornia
Executive Director
HJSirtb
c,e,t Ausmus
Miller
